mapper.select: SELECT S.SALE_STOCK_NO, S.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, S.SALE_STOCK_FORM, S.SALE_STOCK_NAME, S.SALE_PRICE, S.SALE_STATUS, S.SALE_ADDRESS, S.SCALE, TO_CHAR(S.APPLICATION_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APPLICATION_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(S.APPLICATION_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APPLICATION_END_DATE, TO_CHAR(S.ANNOUNCEMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ANNOUNCEMENT_DATE, S.COMPANY, S.CONTACT_INFO, S.ACQUISITION_TAX, S.SALE_SUPPLY_AREA, S.SALE_ROOM_COUNT, S.SALE_BATHROOM_COUNT, S.DEPOSIT, S.MIDDLE_PAYMENT, S.BALANCE_PAYMENT, S.REGION_NO, TO_CHAR(S.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE, IMG.SALE_IMG_URL FROM SALE_INFO S JOIN MEMBER M ON S.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SALE_STOCK_NO, SALE_IMG_URL FROM SALE_IMG WHERE SALE_IMG_ORDER = 1 ) IMG ON S.SALE_STOCK_NO = IMG.SALE_STOCK_NO ORDER BY S.SALE_STOCK_NO DESC
SELECT COORD.*, INFO.* FROM SALE_INFO INFO LEFT JOIN SALE_COORD COORD ON INFO.SALE_STOCK_NO = COORD.SALE_STOCK_NO WHERE INFO.SALE_STOCK_NO = #{saleStockNo}
SELECT SALE_STOCK_NO, SALE_IMG_URL, SALE_IMG_ORDER, SALE_IMG_TYPE FROM SALE_IMG WHERE SALE_STOCK_NO = #{saleStockNo} ORDER BY SALE_IMG_ORDER ASC
